price: 2. et que tu verras les hommes entrer dans la religion d’Allah en foules,
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
